short_description: central florida cancer center is an oncology clinic based in polk county, florida, united states.
long_description: the central florida cancer institute was founded in the year 2000. two offices, located in davenport and lake wales, offer radiation oncology and general urology services. the medical staff consists of radiation oncologists, a radiologist and urologists providing a multi-disciplinary approach in treating and caring for patients. our cancer center in davenport was designed and managed by dr. randy heysek, is staffed with trained medical, clerical and administrative personnel, who are dedicated to the treatment of cancer patients. each center offers state-of-the-art technology. we provide complete cancer care close to home. our mission at our cancer center in davenport. dedicated to providing the most advanced cancer care providing complete cancer care close to home. our mission at the central florida cancer institute is to enhance quality of life, facilitate adaptation, and improve health outcomes through evidence-based care. we don't just treat cancer, we treat people. that's why we treat you with the most advanced technologies and therapies.
